title: 07/01/21 DPS Hour 3
itunes:title: 07/01/21 DPS Hour 3
description:
Dan talks about the name, likeness and image that college athletes can now be paid for. Dan says that Tim Tebow would have made the most money while being an athlete in college had this happened to him while he was in college.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
